name: The Ward of Fear Chapter One
name_original: The Ward of Fear Chapter One
description:
The Ward of Fear Chapter One

You feel an excruciating pain on your body, on your wrists and your forehead.
You suffer strong headaches.
It feels like your skullcap has been separated from the rest of your skull.
After a few seconds everything went black. You feel nothing... no pain... no suffer...
Arise...

- Language: English

- 3D Horror Game

- Multiplayer Coop online Mode only with Gameguru
